services.heading: Our services

about.heading: About us
about.subtitle: Your specialist in accordion, button accordion and music since 2001
about.description: LM Studio & Music Service is your specialist in accordion, button accordion and music technical services since 2001. We offer everything from sales and service to recording, PA rental and digitalization.
about.valueProp1Desc: Direct import, low costs and warranty on used instruments.
about.valueProp2Desc: Everything from sales and service to courses, studio and sound engineering – we offer it all under one roof.
about.valueProp3Desc: We adapt our services to your wishes and needs.

gallery.heading: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: A glimpse into our work, studio and instruments

music.heading: Music
music.subtitle: Album recordings from LM Studio
music.description: Experience the music recorded in our studio. We have worked with many talented artists and produced high-quality recordings.

contact.heading: Contact us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you – contact us for questions, service or a no-obligation chat
contact.formSubtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible

contact.openingHoursDesc: We have no fixed opening hours – everything is arranged as needed. Call or email to schedule an appointment.

footer.aboutText: LM Studio & Music Service is your specialist in accordion, button accordion and music technical services. Since 2001, we have helped both enthusiasts and professionals.
